channel.title: Half Life 2 For Mac
channel.description: It appears that Valve will be releasing Half Life 2, as well as episode 1 and 2 for mac tomorrow. They've also made a video which parodies the 1984 mac ad. Discuss! Web Link and Video- [url]https://www.shacknews.com/onearticle.x/63976[/url]

item.title: Half Life 2 For Mac
item.dc:creator: Maxey
item.description:
That’s weird, because Ep 2 has had tonemapping worked into it in every map.

In fact, what you describe sounds like a glitch actually.

Try verifying your Ep 2 files.

Read full topic

item.title: Half Life 2 For Mac
item.dc:creator: Bolteh
item.description:
Nope, not the shadows.

I’m talking about overly bright/glowy light spot on walls/models when using the flashlight. that changes bightness depending on the angle/distance.

In Ep2, this is just a lit up spot without the glowy stuff, and itdoesn’t change brightness at all when moving around, just the same standard lit up sot, much like how it was in HL1.

item.title: Half Life 2 For Mac
item.dc:creator: Maxey
item.description:
Tonemapping works on a level basis, actually, so if a certain level doesn’t have HDR worked into it, then you won’t see tonemapping.

But if you’re referring to the shadows, then you don’t know what HDR is.
